Question: Dongguan Novaeast Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Novaeast Technology Co., Ltd.

Screen Protectors

 - High-quality tempered glass material
 - Compatibility with various brands (APPLE, SAMSUNG, GOOGLE, HUAWEI, etc.)
 - Customization options available (light customization, sample processing, etc.)
 - Specializes in intelligent display protection

(Note: The summary focuses on the specifications and features of the screen protectors as the raw content primarily discusses these aspects of the company's offerings.)
